|shorts2 = ffffff |socks2 = ffffff }} 'Perth Glory Football Club' is a
professional association football club in Perth, Western Australia, Australia,
competing in Australia's top football competition the A-League. Perth Glory is
one of only three clubs to survive from the now defunct National Soccer League.
The other clubs included and the .
